Control Name: 5.8.8 All public endpoints of this workload are protected/secured with appropriate solution (i.e. Azure Front Door, Azure Firewall...).
Control Statement: External application endpoints should be protected against common attack vectors, such as Denial of Service (DoS) attacks like Slowloris, to prevent potential application downtime due to malicious intent. Azure-native technologies such as Azure Firewall, Application Gateway/Azure Front Door WAF, and DDoS Protection Standard Plan can be used to achieve requisite protection (Azure DDoS Protection).
